Alchemy is an open-source, menu-bar application built with Electron and React that allows users to easily convert and merge files. It provides a simple drag-and-drop interface for batch processing various file types, including merging images into a single PDF.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

WindMouse is a Python library designed to simulate human-like mouse movements, making automated actions less detectable by bot detection systems. It implements the WindMouse algorithm to create natural, non-linear paths with variable speeds, supporting both PyAutoGUI and AutoHotkey backends.
